      • getID

        public int getID(int i)
        Description copied from interface: CoverageFeatureProvider
        Get the unique ID number of the i-th sentence. This may or may not be the same as i. However, it can be assumed that IDs are ordered: if i > j, getID(i) > getID(j).
        Specified by:
        getID in interface CoverageFeatureProvider
        Parameters:
        i - i
        Returns:
        ID

      • getFeaturesInMemory

        public InMemoryCFProvider getFeaturesInMemory(int off,
                                     int len)
        Get in-memory access to a subset of the features. The features will be accessible from the in-memory provider with index numbers 0..(len-1).
        Parameters:
        off - first index of features to be made available in the in-memory provider.
        len - number of features to provide.
        Returns:
        an in-memory context feature provider.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if off or off+len-1 are outside the range from 0 to getNumSentences()-1.
